select mr.Report_ID, mr.Title, mr.Logo, mr.Source, mr.Content, mr.Statu, mr.CreateTime, mr.Opt_Date, mr.Admin_ID,a.adminName from Media_Reports mr LEFT JOIN Admin a on a.Admin_ID=mr.Admin_ID
mr.Title like '%{map.title}%'

mapper.insert: insert into Media_Reports( Report_ID, Title, Logo, Source, Content, Statu, CreateTime, Opt_Date, Admin_ID) values (#{id},#{title},#{logo},#{source},#{content},#{statu},now(), now(), #{optId})
mapper.select: select Report_ID, Title, Logo, Source, Content, Statu, CreateTime, Opt_Date, Admin_ID from Media_Reports where Title=#{title} and Report_ID!=#{id}
mapper.update:
update Media_Reports
Title=#{title},
Logo=#{logo},
Source=#{source},
Content=#{content},
Admin_ID=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now(),
where Report_ID=#{id}
update Media_Reports set Statu=#{statu} where Report_ID=#{id}
